name: TOO MANY LEMONS
description:
Did you know that 19.4 million TONS of lemons were produced worldwide in 2019? That's just TOO MANY LEMONS. Let's go burn some of them.

Burn lemons. That's all you do in this game.

Good luck.

- HOW TO PLAY -
Drag a lemon into the fire to add 1 to the burn counter.

Drag a lemon off screen to save it and remove 1 from the counter.
